zh.title: 中国首次发行熊猫金币
澳大利亚赢得美洲杯帆船赛
加拿大田径运动员本·约翰逊被取消奥运金牌
苏联解体后，格鲁吉亚加入独联体
欧洲伽利略卫星导航系统首颗试验卫星发射
中国神舟七号成功实现首次太空行走
阿尔及利亚军用飞机坠毁，至少77人死亡
大众汽车承认在美国使用作弊软件应对排放测试

en.title: Spain executed five members of armed groups despite international protests.
Canada's Ocean Ranger oil rig disaster inquiry released its report.
Ben Johnson stripped of Olympic gold medal for doping.
Taliban seized Kabul, establishing their regime in Afghanistan.
East Timor became a member of the United Nations.
SMART-1, the first European lunar probe, was launched.
China launched Shenzhou 7, its third manned space mission.
Kenya's Westgate shopping mall attack began in Nairobi.
Saudi Arabia lifted its ban on women driving.
Azerbaijan launched an offensive in Nagorno-Karabakh.
